notes.note: QEMU: infinite loop in e1000e_write_packet_to_guest() in hw/net/e1000e_core.c

reference.description: bz#1893895: CVE-2020-25707 QEMU: infinite loop in e1000e_write_packet_to_guest() in hw/net/e1000e_core.c

remediation.description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

acknowledgment.description: Red Hat would like to thank Cheolwoo Myung and Gaoning Pan (Zhejiang University) for reporting this issue.

note: An update for the virt:8.3 module is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux Advanced Virtualization 8.3.1.
The Advanced Virtualization module provides the user-space component for running virtual machines that use KVM in environments managed by Red Hat products.
